description.en: DAD as a new generation of decentralized advertising public chain, committed to creating infrastructure to connect global advertising. Through blockchain technology, we could make advertising data more open and transparent; Through lightning network, small high-frequency settlement in the advertising field becomes possible. Through token economic incentive, each role will be more active to maintain the healthy development of DAD ecology.
